membership:
For inquires send an email with the following info to: duhallowgymnastics@gmail.com

* Child's name
* Childs Date of birth
* A contact number

info.body: Our diverse range of classes tailored to cater to every age group and skill level. Our classes start with baby gymnastics, inviting little ones as young as 18 months to explore movement and coordination alongside their parents. As they progress, preschool gymnastics awaits children aged 3 and above, introducing fundamental skills in a playful environment. From ages 5 to 18, our general gymnastics classes provide a dynamic space for skill development. Students are thoughtfully grouped based on their abilities, ensuring a supportive and engaging learning experience for each child.
info.title: Classes
Summer camps
info.body: Immerse your child in an enriching gymnastics experience with our exciting 3-day summer camps. Designed to foster both fun and skill development, these camps provide a fantastic opportunity for children to enhance their gymnastics abilities in a supportive and engaging environment. Whether your child is a budding gymnast or looking to build on existing skills, our summer camps offer a blend of structured training and enjoyable activities, ensuring a memorable and skill-enriching experience. Join us for three days of active learning, friendship, and gymnastics exploration!

info.title: Competitions
info.body:
\
Experience the thrill of our annual club competition at CYMS Newmarket held once a year on the Sunday of the February bank holiday. Open to all children, this event provides a fantastic opportunity to showcase gymnastics skills. Additionally, external competitions are available for gymnasts meeting a certain standard, offering a chance for growth and achievement beyond our club. Elevate your gymnastics journey with us!

info.title: Workshops
info.body:
\
Dive into skill enhancement with our specialized workshops during the Easter and Halloween mid-term breaks. Explore the exciting world of backflips in dedicated workshops designed to teach and refine this dynamic skill. Our workshops go beyond technique; they provide a supportive environment for participants to overcome any fears associated with mastering specific gymnastic skills. Join us during the breaks for a transformative experience, where learning meets conquering challenges!
